title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 145-2.9 - Fees
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 145-2.9 - Fees

State Regulations
(a) No fee will be
charged for: (1)
inspecting records; (2)
searching for records; or
(3)
any certification pursuant to this

Subpart. (b) Copies of
records shall be provided: (1)
at 25 cents per
page, for a page not exceeding 9 x 15 inches in size; or
(2)
at a reasonable amount to cover actual
reproduction costs, as established by the deputy privacy protection officer for
other types of copies. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
§§
145-2.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
